mapper.select: select sc_id,img_file,goods_name, si.sku_id,sku_price,sku_stock,ki.key_name,vi.value_name,join_time,ki.key_id from sku_info si left join sku_relation sr on si.sku_id=sr.sku_id left join value_info vi on vi.value_id=sr.value_id left join key_info ki on vi.key_id=ki.key_id left join shopping_cart s on si.sku_id = s.sku_id left join goods_info gi on si.goods_id = gi.goods_id left join goods_imgs g on gi.goods_id = g.goods_id left join imgs_info ii on g.img_id = ii.img_id where si.sku_id in (select si.sku_id from sku_info si left join shopping_cart sc on si.sku_id = sc.sku_id where u_id=#{uid} ) and img_index=1 order by join_time desc;

select sc_id,img_file,goods_name, si.sku_id,sku_price,sku_stock,ki.key_name,vi.value_name,join_time,ki.key_id from sku_info si left join sku_relation sr on si.sku_id=sr.sku_id left join value_info vi on vi.value_id=sr.value_id left join key_info ki on vi.key_id=ki.key_id left join shopping_cart s on si.sku_id = s.sku_id left join goods_info gi on si.goods_id = gi.goods_id left join goods_imgs g on gi.goods_id = g.goods_id left join imgs_info ii on g.img_id = ii.img_id where si.sku_id in (select si.sku_id from sku_info si left join shopping_cart sc on si.sku_id = sc.sku_id left join sku_relation sr on si.sku_id=sr.sku_id where u_id=#{param1} and sr.value_id=#{param2}) and img_index=1 order by join_time desc;
select value_id,value_name from value_info where key_id=1
